title: Biden to Nominate Cindy McCain to Represent U.S. at U.N. Food Agency
sub_head: Post for widow of Sen. John McCain carries rank of ambassador
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”President Biden will nominate Cindy McCain, the widow of Sen. John McCain, to be U.S. representative to the United Nations Agencies for Food and Agriculture, a post that carries the rank of ambassador, the White House said.
Mrs. McCain was among a handful of high-profile Republicans who endorsed Mr. Biden in the 2020 presidential race.
More to come.
